TopicTitle: The Playstation 1 Version of KSP2 has Overly Pixellated Main Menu Text

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: PS1 Built In | CPU: LSI CoreWare CW33300-based core | GPU: 32-bit Sony GPU (designed by Toshiba) | RAM: 2mb

 

A Picture Really is Worth a Thousand Words.

Things to Note:

  • When I select the menu options using the D Pad on my controller the text highlights and the detail slightly improves
  • Background Highlight Text is a bright CYAN which is hard on the eyes. (Using Blue Filtered glasses to counter to a good degree so it will be ok until 0.1.3.0 when this is fixed)
  • FPS overlay is completely unreadable and doesn't appear to be changing.
  • Craft and Planet animation is changing once per 10 minutes. Oh and I saw the fps change at the same time. Thats a relief. I thought KSP2 had crashed which would have meant another bug report.
  • Took 3 hours to get to the main menu. Luckily I also bought a copy of KSP2 for my Nintendo 64 so I did testing on that in the mean time. (Clearer text by the way)
